overview.en: UNO is a digital asset in [UNIWORLD]. It is initiated and operated by the Singapore entity UNI Capital. It can be used for mortgage, trading, leasing, etc. through mining output. The total number of UNOs is 21 million, and the daily output is 1.4W. The output of each quarter in the first 3 years has been reduced by 10%, and the output remains unchanged after 3 years. A total of 21 years can be dug
overview.zh: UNO是【UNIWORLD】 中的数字资产，由新加坡主体 UNI Capital 发起并运营，经游戏挖矿产出，可用于抵押、交易、租赁等。UNO总量2100万枚，每日产出1.4W枚，前3年内每季度产量减少10%，3年后产量维持不变，总共可挖21年
